data.comment: Own goal! Shaquille Pinas has scored at the wrong end to make it 0-1.
In the minute 45, Wessel Dammers (Groningen) has received a first yellow card.
The second-half is underway in Den Haag.
In the minute 46, Aleksandar Rankovic (Den Haag) is making a first substitution, with Ilay Elmkies replacing Andrei Ratiu.
Den Haag's Michiel Kramer has been booked in Den Haag.
The home team have replaced Vicente Besuijen with Samy Bourard. This is the second substitution made today by Aleksandar Rankovic.
In the minute 58, Jonas Arweiler is replacing Bilal Ould-Chikh for Den Haag at Cars Jeans Stadion.
The home team replace Ilay Elmkies with Kees de Boer.
Groningen make their first substitution with Ahmed El Messaoudi replacing Ramon-Pascal Lundqvist.
In the minute 72, Danny Buijs is making the team's second substitution at Cars Jeans Stadion with Tomas Suslov replacing Mo El Hankouri.
Thomas Poll is replacing Ajdin Hrustic for the away team.
Aleksandar Rankovic is making the team's fifth substitution at Cars Jeans Stadion with Amar Catic replacing Lassana Faye.
In the minute 89, Jorgen Strand Larsen (Groningen) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Patrick Joosten.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-1.
